field.name: width
field.label: Carousel Width
field.description: The maxium width of the carousel. The real width is counted according how much items and buttons are fit into the max width.

field.name: image_width
field.label: Item Image Width
field.description: The image width. If border of padding will be selected, the item width will be bigger.

field.name: image_height
field.label: Item Image Height
field.description: The image height. Width the image border and the image padding item height can be bigger. The carousel height is set according this setting too.

field.name: space_between
field.label: Space Between Images
field.description: Space between items.

field.name: position
field.label: Carousel Position
field.description: The positino of the carousel. Center is margin:0px auto; left / right is float:left and float:right. The left and right margin valid only for float positions accordingly.

field.name: margin_left
field.label: Left Margin
field.description: Space from left. Works only if left / right position set.

field.name: margin_right
field.label: Right Margin
field.description: Space from right. Works only if left / right position set.

field.name: margin_top
field.label: Top Margin
field.description: Space from top

field.name: margin_bottom
field.label: Bottom Margin
field.description: Space from bottom

field.name: clear_both
field.label: Add Clear Both
field.description: Add clear:both div to the end of the carousel html. It removes the floating position.

field.name: border_width
field.label: Image Border Width
field.description: The border around the image. Set to 0 for no border.

field.name: border_color
field.label: Border Color
field.description: The color of the image border

field.name: image_padding
field.label: Image Padding
field.description: Padding around the image. Used for 'double border' effect, set to 0 for disable

field.name: image_back_color
field.label: Image Background Color
field.description: The color of the image padding.

field.name: hover_border_color
field.label: Border Color - Mouseover
field.description: The color of the image border on link mouseover (works only if enabled slide link)

field.name: image_hover_back_color
field.label: Back. Color - Mouseover
field.description: The color of the image padding on link mouseover (works only if enabled slide link)

field.name: show_arrows
field.label: Show Direction Arrows
field.description: Show the side arrows

field.name: arrow_type
field.label: Arrows Type
field.description: Choose the arrows type from the arrows dialog

field.name: arrows_padding_sides
field.label: Arrows Sides Padding
field.description: The horizontal space between the arrows and the sides of the carousel. Negative value will bring the arrows closer to the carousel.

field.name: arrows_vertical_tuning
field.label: Arrows Vertical Tuning
field.description: You can play with the vertical position of the arrows by settings the tuning value. If negative value, the arrows goes up

field.name: direction
field.label: Direction
field.description: The direction in witch the arrows will move

field.name: pause_duration
field.label: Pause Duration
field.description: Pause between transitions

field.name: scroll_items
field.label: Num Scrolling Items
field.description: Number of items scrolling each time. If set to 0 - then the all visible items will scroll

field.name: easing
field.label: Scrolling Type
field.description: The scrolling easign type. Change and see how it affects the transition

field.name: trans_duration
field.label: Transition Duration
field.description: The duration of the transition

field.name: pause_on_hover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Pause on mouse over the carousel
